channel.title: How to make people admin
channel.description: how do i make people admin on my server I go into there name and type 2 for there rights but still does not make them admin plz help

item.title: How to make people admin
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:4, topic:99344”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=142686.msg1365422#msg1365422 date=1179976374]
You need to complie your server . Then you need to runserver.bat .
[/quote]

No offence, but that’s the worse explanation I’ve heard ever.

Here’s mines (=/);

Go into you’re source file, be it Testscape, Hybridscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the character file you wan’t to make a Moderator/Administrator and then change the rights to one of the following;

1 = Moderator

2 = Administrator

3 = Owner

Then save the file. Make sure the player is logged out.[/quote]

I was just continuing from what he had done . No offence taken .

Read full topic

item.title: How to make people admin
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Tico135:

You need to complie your server . Then you need to runserver.bat .

No offence, but that’s the worse explanation I’ve heard ever.

Here’s mines (=/);

Go into you’re source file, be it Testscape, Hybridscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the character file you wan’t to make a Moderator/Administrator and then change the rights to one of the following;

1 = Moderator

2 = Administrator

3 = Owner

Then save the file. Make sure the player is logged out.

Read full topic
